New Records: Chet Holmgren tied a career high with 14 rebounds
Key Match Events: Holmgren blocked a shot by Jokic, ran the down the court, took a pass and threw down a powerful dunk
The Thunder's bench outscored the Nuggets' reserves 25-16
Pre-Game Insights: Before the game, Denver players and coaches paid tribute to the late Dikembe Mutombo by wearing T-shirts emblazoned with an image of the big man's iconic finger wag
Miscellaneous Highlights: At an average of 24 years, 148 days, the Thunder opened the regular season with the youngest roster in the league
The Thunder play their home opener at 6 p.m. Sunday against the Atlanta Hawks
Others: The Thunder and Nuggets both finished 57-25 last season, with the Thunder earning the No. 1 seed in the Western Conference by virtue of a tiebreaker
